publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-1320 Dennis Canavan: Atrocities in Iraq-That the Parliament condemns the brutal murder of Nick Berg and the torture and degrading treatment of prisoners in Iraq and calls for the replacement of American and British forces in Iraq by United Nations forces until such time as the people of Iraq are able to elect a democratic government.
S2M-1320 Atrocities in Iraq (lodged on 14 May 2004) Christine Grahame*, Alex Neil*
S2M-1320 Atrocities in Iraq (lodged on 14 May 2004) Pauline McNeill*
S2M-1320 Atrocities in Iraq (lodged on 14 May 2004) Ms Sandra White*
S2M-1320 Atrocities in Iraq (lodged on 14 May 2004) Elaine Smith*
